posts.post_content:
Looking to buy low grade rarer backs.

Looking for

Broadleaf 460
Red Hindu

If you have any or know anyone with some they are willing to part with, please send me a message.

Thanks

I've been thinking of selling this card, and would listen to offers on it. Feel free to PM me.

Vin
